definition: deeply absorbed in thought, people who are destined to die soon
details:
adjective
- deeply absorbed in thought
= synonyms: preoccupied
- not caught with the senses or the mind
= example: not caught with the senses or the mind
= synonyms: missed
- unable to function
= synonyms: helpless
- no longer in your possession or control
- spiritually or physically doomed or destroyed
= example: spiritually or physically doomed or destroyed
- not gained or won
= example: not gained or won
- having lost your bearings
= synonyms: confused, disoriented
- perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements
= synonyms: confused
- incapable of being recovered or regained
= example: incapable of being recovered or regained
= synonyms: unrecoverable, irrecoverable
noun
- people who are destined to die soon
= synonyms: doomed
